climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: [Thick Cushion] The seat cushion measures 18.11" x 16.14" x 4.76" and includes about 4.7" thick soft memory foam gently conforms to your body, giving you a comfortable experience. The shape of the chair cushion is ergonomically designed to hold up the thighs and hips, effectively helping to alleviate the discomfort caused by sitting for long periods of time.

[Advanced Design] Our seat cushion is made of high-density memory foam. Super soft velvet cover with high quality embroidery for a premium look. The cover is equipped with a high-quality smooth zipper and is removable and machine washable. The bottom of the seat cushion has a special non-slip design, so you don't have to worry about the cushion sliding.

[Tailbone Pain Relief] The seat cushion's unique cocked edge design provides adequate support for the legs and hips, effectively reducing sciatica, tailbone, back pain, leg numbness and hip pain. In addition, this thick chair cushion also helps to improve posture and relieve sedentary fatigue.

[Practical Gift] The seat cushion is both soft and supportive, not easily dented, and suitable for sedentary people. Perfect as a practical gift for your family, friends, bosses, clients and colleagues.
[Suitable For Most Chairs] This seat cushion is thick and is sized for most chairs, perfect for office, home, travel, game stands, car seats or wheelchairs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I now have 3 of these so I don't need to keep moving them from location to location. They are good, sturdy cushions, but will start to squish after a couple of yrs. Definitely gives me tailbone some relief. I can recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, Big and Soft
reviews.reviewText: I am in love with this cushion afer my tailbone injury. I have been doing physical therapy at home and I just sit it in bed to meditate at night and in the mornings. Its big, thick and super comfortable. Even my boyftiend wants one due to his physical job and it helps relieve some strain from the lower back. It also helped me when I had to go back to work and sit at my desk. I would still recommend getting up and walking around as a norm if you are a 9 to 5er. Love it, thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Woud help relieve back and/or hip pain for many people
reviews.reviewText: The seat on my premium home office chair seemed to be causing me back and hip pain and I went searching for a cushion shaped like a tractor saddle. This cushion is designed with strategic shaping and some resilient softness that helps correct the chair seat's tendency to turn the thighs inward. The cushion also has a notch to take pressure off the tailbone. The cushion is not perfect but it is an improvement and my pain after prolonged sitting is less than before.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BlissTrends Seat Cushion to sit on metal bleachers for an all day tournament gave great comfort!!!
reviews.reviewText: I just took this BlissTrends cushion to an all day tournament to sit on metal bleachers. I have a plate and screws in my lower leg that cause nerve pain when I sit on hard benches with no back. While this is way too deep and I am petite, I put the back along the back edge of my bleacher (not hanging over behind me) and the front flaps just easily bent down, comfy under my knees. It is wider than some marked bleacher seats, but was not a problem where I went. It stayed put, too. Not only did my leg do great for the first time and the longest time, but my back and my rump were fine too! My posture was better. I'm short so it raised me to other's heights. And it has a great handle. Other people were complaining about painful aches from the LONG day sitting, while I was comfy. It's not helpful for my desk chair (my individual needs), but it's GREAT for bleachers, its intended use. My grandma-body was just fine next day too: the key positive result! Worth every penny for me!!! (Just be aware of arena seat width restrictions.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Can't Live Without This Seat Cushion
reviews.reviewText: I fractured my tail bone in a fall about 1 1/2 years ago. I tried "donut" cushions and other homemade ideas, but was still miserable. This Bliss Trends Seat Cushion has enabled me to sit without pain! It is very comfortable. I did have to try it in different positions from back and front to find My perfect placement. It is holding its shape and is made of quality materials. I can't emphasize enough how much I love this cushion!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and thick
reviews.reviewText: Works great before and after my hip replacement surgery. Recommended twice today to co-workers. It's tax season so sitting 8 to 10 hours a day is tough on a bottom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good size for mature woman
reviews.reviewText: Tough to shop online for items because you can't touch or try out the product. This seemed like it checked all the boxes. The foam is very soft. On a hard chair it compresses to almost no padding. Probably ok on a firm sofa for a little more support. The size fits a mature woman. That's a good thing. And the covering is soft. I would compare it to a car wash sponge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I weight 200 pounds and provides great cushioning! I sit at a desk for 8hrs a day and my lower back and tail bone area would ache at night! Now with this I don’t feel pain from sitting. It is pretty big and funny butt shape but it supports the right places and I squish it down a lot so glad I went w this size.

reviews.reviewerName: El soporte es bueno . De buen material y no se derrapa. Me gustaría que fuera del tamaño de la laptop para mayor estabilidad es del tamañoDe una tableta. Aún así cumple bien su función . Por el precio está genial .
reviews.reviewTitle: Es cómodo pero no con el soporte que esperaba
reviews.reviewText: El cojín es de buen material excelente tamaño y calidad pero no con el soporte que necesito y esperaba. En realidad se hunde en su totalidad y con el peso no se siente gran soporte . Estoy un poco decepcionada .

Considerar que el tamaño del producto es grande, aproximadamente 10cms de altura, no alto para todas las personas, además de que por el tipo de material se calienta después de un rato de uso, aún así es muy cómodo de usar

reviews.reviewTitle: cojín el mejor cojín de meditación aunque lo uses varias horaspara trabajar.
reviews.reviewText: Es suficientemente grueso para dar el apoyo necesario en glúteos. Lo volvería a comprar.
